definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: The first semi-autobiographical movie "Miracle Girl" will also be shot in China.
sentences.chinese: 第一部半自傳式的電影“奇蹟少女”也將在國內拍色。

sentences.english: Her latest work cannot be catagorized as either a novel or an autobiography.
sentences.chinese: 她的最新作品既不能歸爲小說，也不能算作自傳。

sentences.english: The album is, in many ways, autobiographical.
sentences.chinese: 在很大程度上，這張專輯就是我的自傳。

sentences.english: PLAYBOY: You've admitted that many of your movies are semiautobiographical.
sentences.chinese: 你曾承認你的電影都是半自傳性質的。
請寫下你共300頁的自傳的第297頁內容。

sentences.english: To the writer of real estate advertisements, the autobiographer is the most suspect of prose artists.
sentences.chinese: 自傳作者是僅次於房地產廣告作者的最可疑的散文家。

sentences.english: He records in his memoir how thrilled he was when Astaire praised him.
sentences.chinese: 他在自傳中寫到自己受阿斯泰爾誇獎時是多麼激動。

sentences.english: You certainly won't find anything like that in the Twain autobiography.
sentences.chinese: 你肯定不會在吐溫的自傳中找到任何類似的事。

sentences.english: Is the story of the stone an auto biographical novel?
sentences.chinese: “石頭記”是一本自傳體的小說嗎？

sentences.english: Edit an autobiography of a handsome man or a pretty woman as you like.
sentences.chinese: 給自己胡編亂造一個帥哥美女的自傳。

sentences.english: Many plants self-pollinate, but most orchids need help to reproduce.
sentences.chinese: 許多植物自傳花粉，但絕大多數蘭花需要外界的幫助。

sentences.english: It makes Mobai's novel have one kind of rich autobiography color all the time.
sentences.chinese: 它使墨白的小說始終具有一種濃郁的自傳色彩。

sentences.english: The first half of this work is an autobiographical chronology of the author's life.
sentences.chinese: 前半部分的內容是作者人生的自傳年表。

sentences.english: Some of the content of the autobiography was potentially libelous .
sentences.chinese: 那本自傳的部分內容可能帶有誹謗意味。

sentences.english: Across the Atlantic, Blair's chunky memoir will seem even more antique.
sentences.chinese: 大洋對岸，布萊爾厚厚實實的自傳就更顯得過時。

sentences.english: Finally, the autobiography is in itself a profound act of compassion.
sentences.chinese: 最後，這本自傳本身就是意義深遠的善舉。

definition: to include (in a collection)/to put together (stories, poems etc)/to record/to employ/to recruit
legendary/fantasy saga/romance/short stories of the Tang and Song Dynasty
guide (e.g. book or other printed material)
to compose a piece of music
